00043 class test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick : public RegressionSuite, public RegressionCheck
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     int numPassed;
00047     int numFailed;
00048     std::string m_testDir; 
00049     std::set<std::string> setIgnore;
00050     std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
00051     std::vector<std::string> vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles;
00052 
00053   std::string m_OutPrefix;
00054   std::string m_OutModifier;
00055   std::set<std::string> m_SetSetIgnore;
00056   std::vector<std::string> m_ToCompare;
00057 
00058   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00059     return equivalency(m_OutPrefix, m_OutModifier, m_ToCompare, m_SetSetIgnore);
00060   }
00061 
00062     test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick()
00063     {
00064         numPassed = 0;
00065         numFailed = 0;
00066 
00067         // Header paramters to ignore
00068         setIgnore.insert("FileCreationTime");
00069         setIgnore.insert("FileIdentifier");
00070         setIgnore.insert("program-version");
00071         setIgnore.insert("create_date");
00072         setIgnore.insert("create-date");
00073         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-verbose");
00074         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-exec-guid");
00075         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-program-cvs-id");
00076         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-version-to-report");
00077         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-command-line");
00078         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-mem-usage");
00079         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-run-probeset-genotype");
00080         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cels");
00081         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-out-dir");
00082         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-time-start");
00083         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-free-mem-at-start");
00084         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-temp-dir");
00085 
00086         // Data Set columns to ignore (Specify as Group.Set.Column)
00087 //        setIgnore.insert("AlgorithmData.MarkerABSignal.SCAR");
00088 
00089         // Data Set column epsilon override (Specify as Group.Set.Column)
00090 //        mapEpsilon.insert(std::pair<std::string, float>("AlgorithmData.MarkerABSignal.SCAR", (float)0.0005));
00091         mapEpsilon.insert(std::pair<string, float>("Segments.CN.MeanMarkerDistance", 376.0f));
00092         // File tags to check for equivalency
00093         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-As_NA18603_B03_01_NN_20081218");
00094         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-Cs_NA10857_A10_01_NN_20081218");
00095                 #ifdef __LP64__
00096                 #ifdef __linux__
00097         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-As_NA18547_A08_01_NN_20081218");
00098         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-Cs_NA12003_D04_01_NN_20081218");
00099         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218");
00100                 #endif
00101                 #endif
00102     }
00103 
00104     void execute(const std::string& str)  {
00105       std::string cmd = Fs::convertCommandToUnc(str);
00106       if (system(cmd.c_str()) != 0) {Err::errAbort("Execution failed for command: " + cmd);}
00107     }
00108 
00109         void equivalency(   const std::string& name,
00110                             const std::string& modifier,
00111                             std::vector<string>& vFileTags)
00112         {
00113                 std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
00114 
00115                  equivalency(    name,
00116                                 modifier,
00117                                 vFileTags,
00118                                 setSetIgnore);
00119 
00120         }
00121 
00122         bool equivalency(   const std::string& name,
00123                             const std::string& modifier,
00124                             std::vector<string>& vFileTags,
00125                             std::set<std::string>& setSetIgnore)
00126     {
00127         bool bPassed = true;
00128         AffxString strFileName1;
00129         AffxString strFileName2;
00130         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00131         for(unsigned int i = 0; (i < vFileTags.size()); i++)
00132         {
00133 
00134             strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/copynumber-cyto/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + "." + modifier + ".cychp";
00135             strFileName2 = Fs::join(m_testDir , name,  vFileTags[i] ) + "." + modifier + ".cychp";
00136             if (!Calvin::equivalent(strFileName1, strFileName2, setIgnore,setSetIgnore, mapEpsilon, 0.0001, 0.9999989, false)) {bPassed = false;}
00137         }
00138         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00139         if (bPassed) {
00140                   Verbose::out(1, "***Passed*** " + name + " vs " + modifier);
00141                   numPassed++;
00142                 }
00143                 else {
00144                   Verbose::out(1, "***Failed*** " + name + " vs " + modifier);
00145                   numFailed++;
00146                 }
00147                 return bPassed;
00148     }
00149 
00150     void run()
00151     {
00152       //single();
00153       batch();
00154     }
00155 
00156     void single()
00157     {
00158           //Fs::rm_rf("test-generated/qt-single/", false);
00159           std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
00160 #ifndef __LP64__
00161           {
00162                   std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00163                   std::string ignoreString2 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00164                   setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00165                   setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00166           }
00167 #endif
00168 #ifdef __APPLE__
00169           {
00170                   std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00171                   std::string ignoreString2 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00172                   setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00173                   setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00174           }
00175 #endif
00176           std::string ignoreString = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00177           setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00178 
00179 
00180           string idata="../../../regression-data/data/idata";
00181           string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir , "qt-single");
00182           vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00183           m_OutPrefix = "qt-single";
00184           m_OutModifier = "ca";
00185           m_ToCompare =  vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles;
00186           m_SetSetIgnore.clear();
00187           m_SetSetIgnore = setSetIgnore;
00188           checks.push_back(this);
00189           string name = "qt-single";
00190           string command =
00191             string("./apt-copynumber-cyto") +
00192             " -v 1" +
00193             " --cyto2 true" +
00194             " --force true" +
00195             " --text-output true" +
00196             " --cnchp-output false" +
00197             " --cychp-output true" +
00198             " --set-analysis-name ca" +
00199             " --reference-input "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.REF_MODEL" +
00200             " --snp-reference-input-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5" +
00201             " --spf-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.spf" +
00202             " --chrX-probes "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes" +
00203             " --chrY-probes "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes" +
00204             " --annotation-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db" +
00205             " --probe-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab" +
00206             " --snp-qc-snp-list "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt" +
00207             " --cels "+idata+"/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18547_A08_01_NN_20081218.CEL" +
00208             " --cels "+idata+"/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18603_B03_01_NN_20081218.CEL" +
00209             " --cels "+idata+"/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218.CEL" +
00210             " --cels "+idata+"/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-Cs_NA10857_A10_01_NN_20081218.CEL" +
00211             " --cels "+idata+"/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-Cs_NA12003_D04_01_NN_20081218.CEL" +
00212             " --out-dir " + outdir +
00213             " --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3" +
00214             " --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0" +
00215             " --xx-cutoff=0.8" +
00216             " --xx-cutoff-high=1.07" +
00217             " --y-cutoff=0.65" +
00218             " --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5" +
00219             " --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50" +
00220             " --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6" +
00221             " --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5" +
00222             " --analysis cn-segment" +
00223             " --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0" +
00224             " --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251" +
00225             " --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05" +
00226             " --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method" +
00227             " --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false" +
00228             " --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0" +
00229             " --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001" +
00230             " --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3"
00231             " --reference-chromosome=22";
00232           RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks, false);
00233           test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00234           if(!test.pass()) {
00235             Verbose::out(1, "Error in: " + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00236           }
00237 
00238         }

00240   void batch()
00241   {
00242     //Fs::rm_rf("test-generated/qt-batch/", false);
00243     string idata="../../../regression-data/data/idata";
00244     string outdir = Fs::join(m_testDir, "qt-batch");
00245           vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00246           m_OutPrefix = "qt-batch";
00247           m_OutModifier = "ca";
00248           m_ToCompare =  vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles;
00249           string name = "qt-batch";
00250           string command =
00251             string("./apt-copynumber-cyto")+
00252             " -v 1"+
00253             " --cyto2 true" +
00254             " --force true" +
00255             " --text-output true" +
00256             " --cnchp-output false" +
00257             " --cychp-output true" +
00258             " --set-analysis-name ca" +
00259             " --reference-output " + m_testDir + "/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL" +
00260             " --snp-reference-input-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5" +
00261             " --snp-reference-output-file " +
00262             m_testDir +
00263             "/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5" +
00264             " --spf-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.spf" +
00265             " --chrX-probes "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes" +
00266             " --chrY-probes "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes" +
00267             " --annotation-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db" +
00268             " --probe-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab" +
00269             " --snp-qc-snp-list "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt" +
00270             " --gender-override-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-LOHReference-Full-Genders.txt" +
00271             " --genotype-call-override-file "+idata+"/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMapCalls_LOHReferenceSet-FullArray.txt" +
00272             " --cel-files "+idata+"/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/CELFileList_5F5M.txt" +
00273             " --out-dir " + outdir +
00274             " --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3" +
00275             " --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0" +
00276             " --xx-cutoff=0.8" +
00277             " --xx-cutoff-high=1.07" +
00278             " --y-cutoff=0.65" +
00279             " --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5" +
00280             " --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50" +
00281             " --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6" +
00282             " --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5" +
00283             " --analysis cn-segment" +
00284             " --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0" +
00285             " --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251" +
00286             " --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05" +
00287             " --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method" +
00288             " --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false" +
00289             " --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0" +
00290             " --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001" +
00291             " --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 "+
00292             " --reference-chromosome=22";
00293 
00294         bool bPassed = true;
00295         std::set<std::string> setIgnore;
00296         std::string strFileName1 = ""+idata+"/copynumber-cyto/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5";
00297         std::string strFileName2 = m_testDir + "/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.snpref.a5";
00298 //        checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "Parameters", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00299         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "EMSNParameters", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00300         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "EMSNArray", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00301         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "SNPReference", "SNPReference", setIgnore, 0.0003, 1.0));
00302 
00303         strFileName1 = ""+idata+"/copynumber-cyto/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL";
00304         strFileName2 = m_testDir + "/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL";
00305 //        checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "Parameters", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00306         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "AntigenomicProbes", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00307         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "MedianSignals", setIgnore, 0.5, 0.999999));
00308         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "ProbeEffects", setIgnore, 0.0001, 0.999999));
00309         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SNPPosteriors", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00310         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SketchCN", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00311         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "SketchSNP", setIgnore, 0.0001, 1.0));
00312         checks.push_back(new File5EquivalentCheck(strFileName1, strFileName2, "Cyto2", "WaveCorrection", setIgnore, 0.0001, 0.999999));
00313                 RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00314                 test.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00315                 bPassed = test.pass();
00316                 numPassed += test.getNumPassed();
00317                 numFailed += test.getNumFailed();
00318                 if(!bPassed) {
00319                   Verbose::out(1, "Error in: " + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00320                 }
00321         if (bPassed)
00322                   {
00323 
00324                     std::set<std::string> setSetIgnore;
00325 #ifndef __LP64__
00326                     {
00327                       std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00328                       std::string ignoreString2 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00329                       setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00330                       setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00331                     }
00332 #endif
00333 #ifdef __APPLE__
00334                     {
00335                       std::string ignoreString = "Segments.Mosaicism";
00336                       std::string ignoreString2 = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00337                       setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00338                       setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString2);
00339                     }
00340 #endif
00341                     std::string ignoreString = "ProbeSets.AllelePeaks";
00342                     setSetIgnore.insert(ignoreString);
00343 
00344                     string outdir2 = Fs::join(m_testDir, "qt-batch2");
00345                     //Fs::rm_rf(outdir2, false);
00346                     vector<RegressionCheck *> checks2;
00347                     m_OutPrefix = "qt-batch2";
00348                     m_OutModifier = "ca";
00349                     m_SetSetIgnore = setSetIgnore;
00350                     m_ToCompare =  vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles;
00351                     checks2.push_back(this);
00352                     string name2 = "qt-batch2";

00354                       string("./apt-copynumber-cyto") +
00355                       " -v 3" +
00356                       " --cyto2 true" +
00357                       " --force true" +
00358                       " --text-output true" +
00359                       " --cnchp-output false" +
00360                       " --cychp-output true" +
00361                       " --set-analysis-name ca" +
00362                       " --reference-input " +

00364                       "/qt-batch/Cytogenetics_Array.10_cels.REF_MODEL" +

00388                       " --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0" +
00389                       " --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251" +
00390                       " --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05" +
00391                       " --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method" +
00392                       " --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false" +
00393                       " --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0" +
00394                       " --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001" +
00395                       " --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 " +
00396                       " --reference-chromosome=22";
00397 
00398                     RegressionTest test2(name2.c_str(), command2.c_str(), checks2, false);
00399                     test2.setSuite(*this,  outdir2, outdir2 + "/apt-copynumber-cyto.log", outdir2 + "/valgrind.batch2.log");
00400                     if(!test2.pass()) {
00401                       Verbose::out(1, "Error in: " + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00402                     }
00403                   }
00404         else {numFailed++;}
00405   }
00406 };
00407 
00408 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00409   try {
00410 
00411     // Quick test uses ~ 100MB of disk space. 
00412     FsTestDir testDir;
00413     testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-cyto-qt", true);
00414 
00415     ofstream logOut;
00416     string logName;
00417     logName = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "qt-test-regression-copynumber-cyto-quick.log");
00418     Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
00419     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00420     LogStream log(3, &logOut);
00421 
00422     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00423     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00424     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00425 
00426     Verbose::setLevel(3);
00427     test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick test;
00428     test.m_testDir = testDir.asString();
00429     test.parseArgv(argv);
00430     test.doValgrind();
00431     string database = test.getDatabase();
00432 
00433     Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-copynumber-cyto-quick");
00434 
00435     test.run();
00436 
00437     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed) + " for test-regression-copynumber-cyto-quick");
00438     logOut.close();
00439     return test.numFailed != 0;
00440   }
00441   catch(...) {
00442       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00443       return 1;
00444   }
00445   return 1;
00446 }
